alert.note: Alert for Major (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 10 at 2:40AM CDT until June 10 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 AM CDT FOR KINGFISHER...SOUTHWESTERN NOBLE...NORTHERN BLAINE...NORTHWESTERN LOGAN...GARFIELD...SOUTHEASTERN MAJOR AND NORTHWESTERN CANADIAN COUNTIES... At 239 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles northeast of Breckenridge to 5 miles east of Hennessey to 3 miles southeast of Watonga, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Enid, Perry, Watonga, Kingfisher, Piedmont, Hennessey, Crescent, Waukomis, Okarche, Garber, Cashion, Covington, Calumet, Dover, Drummond, Cedar Valley, Red Rock, Marshall, Breckenridge, and Mulhall. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
